Rulings.Base: 1. This effect targets 1 face-up monster with 0 ATK your opponent controls.\n2. You keep control of the monster taken by this effect even if it's flipped face-down or its ATK changes.\n3. If the targeted monster is turned flipped face-down by an effect Chained to the effect of "Reptilianne Viper", you do not gain control of the monster.
